Welcome to SharedNote! This page will guide you through the main features of the app and help you solve common questions.

SharedNote is a simple and convenient note-taking app that allows you to:
 • Create and edit notes with titles and content
 • Highlight important notes by coloring their titles
 • Organize notes into folders
 • Change the app language
 • Customize how notes are displayed (list or grid view)
 • Sort notes by different parameters
 • Share notes with another device running SharedNote
Tap the ➕ Add button to create a new note. Enter a title and content, choose whether it’s active or archived.
Create folders to keep your notes structured. Move notes between folders anytime.
Assign different colors to note titles. Use bright colors to emphasize urgent or important items.
Switch app language in settings. Choose how notes are displayed: list view for compactness or grid view for visibility.
Sort notes by creation date, title, or activity. Use the search bar to quickly find notes.
Share notes with another device that has SharedNote installed. Useful for switching phones or syncing.
• Change Theme – pick a color theme.\n • Language – switch between supported languages.\n • View Mode – select list or grid view.

Q: How do I transfer notes to another phone?
A: Use the Share feature inside the app.

 Q: Can I back up my notes?
A: Yes. Notes can be exported and restored on another device.

 Q: Can I highlight important notes?
A: Yes, by assigning colors to note titles.

 Q: Does SharedNote work offline?
A: Absolutely. All features work without internet access.
